page.title: 20REED & CHARLES,BUILDERS
page.content: Utilising the Tacolneston garage & its buildings this family_run business set up its headquarters in the village in 1982. They are the main contractors for a London_based company & their contracts extend throughout Norfolk & Suffolk, with future developments at Blofield, Attleborough & Rickinghall. Civil engineering works are also under _taken & mainly consist of laying main sewers,storm water drains & the const_ ruction of estate roads & public foot_ paths.In order to maintain a high standard of energy saving the Co. in_ sulate all their properties with RMC polybead. Although the garage has closed down this month, the building side of the company brings a welcome amount of employment to the village.
